EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Enterprise Case Study - Swiss Re - 2015.03.25.Email - Follow up - Atte
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Swiss Re’s Path to SaaS Quality Assurance with Tosca Testsuite
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Click here for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for more presentations.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Ismail Celik Head of Test Automation Swiss Re
Michael Nosko Service Account Manager Tricentis
